channel.title: WebXR on GraphWiz
channel.description: Recent content in WebXR on GraphWiz

item.title: GraphWiz Now Hosts Immersive WebXR Experience
item.description: TLDR; The official WebXR Demo Instance is down. Luckily, GraphWiz hosts a private version of it: https://tobias-weiss.org/hello-webxr/ Mozillaâ€™s immersive WebXR experience, designed to introduce newcomers to the world of Virtual Reality, is now hosted by GraphWiz. The experience is accessible via a single click from a WebXR-enabled browser. The application represents a significant advancement in VR accessibility. It utilizes the WebXR technology, a collaborative effort from a consortium including Google, Microsoft, and Mozilla, among other industry leaders.
